I cannot reproduce the problem.

Both this and bug 27278 appear to be getting the NPE when calling getVM().
All of our code assumes that this will not be null but this is not the case if 
the timing is bad or if a "zombie" target is left around.
*** Bug 27857 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
